nodes.text: The position of Prime Oligarch was held by the leader of the Cadinth Oligarchy, which led the Mid Rim world of Cadinth during the waning decades of the Galactic Republic. Rankwin Fopow held the title in 22 BBY, during the Separatist Crisis. He declared his government's support of the Galactic Republic against the Separatists. After a pro-Separatist uprising on Cadinth resulted in the death of the planet's Jedi Watchman, Bodis-Ker Vitan, the government retracted the planet's endorsement of the Republic, with Fopow later declaring that the planet was instead "firmly undecided" between the two groups.

The title of Prime Oligarch was mentioned in an issue of the HoloNet News feed (2002), Volume 531, Issue 55, that was published in-universe on the ninth day of the third month in 22 BBY. The article that references the position, entitled "Cadinth Loyalty Uncertain After Jedi Death," was written by Pablo Hidalgo and Paul Ens.
